page.title: 01SKELMERSDALE NEW TOWN
page.content: Although designated a New Town, Skelmersdale was mentioned in the {Doomsday Book of 1087}when it was a village owned by Uctred who ruled over Dalton and Upholland. Today it is a town of some 45000 people developed to act as an{overspill town for {Liverpool.}There is a central Concourse Shopping Centre, a Police Station, Swimming Pool and Sports Centre a Library, 21 Infant and Junior Schools, 5 Secondary Schools and an F.E. College. There are a number of churches including the{Ecumenical {Centre}which is a joint work by the Anglican, Methodist, Baptist, and United Reformed Churches. There are big{residential}and {industrial}areas although the latter are not fully used as the town experiences a time of high unemployment.
